MonsterTrait.Name: Charge
MonsterTrait.Text: If the black knight commander is mounted and moves at least 30 feet in a straight line toward a target and then hits it with a melee attack on the same turn, the target takes an extra 10 (3d6) damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Hateful Aura
MonsterTrait.Text: The black knight commander and allies within 10 feet of the commander add its Charisma modifier to weapon damage rolls (included in damage below).

MonsterTrait.Name: Magic Weapons
MonsterTrait.Text: The black knight commander's weapon attacks are made with magical (+1) weapons.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The black knight commander makes two melee attacks.

MonsterAction.Name: Mace
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 5 ft, one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) bludgeoning damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Lance
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (1d12 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Frightful Charge (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest)
MonsterTrait.Text: The black knight commander lets loose a terrifying cry and makes one melee attack at the end of a charge. Whether the attack hits or misses, all enemies within 15 feet of the target and aware of the black knight commander's presence must succeed on a DC 13 Wisdom saving throw or become frightened for 1 minute. A frightened creature repeats the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.
